description: This file defines a Flutter widget 'BookCard' that displays a compact, tappable representation of a book, including image, author, title, rating, and price. It handles navigation to a detailed book page on tap.

classes.name: BookCard
classes.description: A stateless widget representing a compact display of book information, including image, author, title, rating, and price, with tap navigation.

methods.name: _openDetails
methods.description: Navigates to the book detail page using the book's ID when the card is tapped.
